title: narasimhuDu
sahitya:
narasimhuDu dayincenu sabhA sthambamuna asuruni garvapu palukulu uDikanu


anupallavi

  sarasijAsanANDamu pagala dikkuladara nakhambuluDUla jaladhi ghUrNilla
dharaNi vaNaNa kanaka kashipudhrunca utkIrNAgni jvAluDai ugratanu
				(ciTTasvara)
pa dha pA ma ga pA ma gA sa ni sa ga ma pa dha pA ma gA ma pa ni sa* sa* ; ni dha pa ni dha pa ma
sa* ga* sa* sa* ni dha pa ma ga ma pa sA ga ma pa nI ga ma pa dhA sa ga ma pA ma* ga* sa* ni dha pa ma ga				


caraNam    nIcuDaina dhanujuni poTTa vajra samamulaina nakhambulacE jIri
niSkAruNyuDai rudhirAmunu drAvi prEgula mAlika dharincenu 
vAcAma gOcaruni lakSmI dEvi brahma rudra surEndrAdulu nutulu salupa
vara prahlAduDu mrokkaga shAntuDai vAni karuNinci sadAshiva kavini gAci   
(svara sAhitya)
sanakAdulu vismayimpa suraripu suta bAdha dIrcuTaku pradOSa samayamunanu
velaya khalamulu vaDiganE stanamula paTa paTa paTa paTayanakanu muraripu
